command.ai-mlstudio.walkthrough.title: Welcome to AI Toolkit!
command.ai-mlstudio.walkthrough.descript: Quickly set up a model, try it in real time, and explore advanced features - all in one place.
command.ai-mlstudio.walkthrough.download:
Explore various AI models from LLM to SLM such as Phi, GPT, or Llama in the Model Catalog.
[Open Model Catalog](command:ai-mlstudio.models?%5B%22walkthrough%22%5D)
ðŸš€ If you already have your own model, add it for [remote inference](command:ai-mlstudio.addRemoteInferenceEndpoint?%5B%22walkthrough%22%5D)
command.ai-mlstudio.walkthrough.tryPlayg:
Run a prompt to see how the model works in real time in the Playground. Note sure where to start?
[Try GPT-4.1 mini in Playground](command:ai-mlstudio.walkthrough.tryRemoteModel)
Explore all commands from the Command Palette to manage your datasets, run evaluations, and fine-tune your models.
[Show All Commands](command:ai-mlstudio.walkthrough.showAllCommands)
languageModelTool.ai-mlstudio.getAgentCo: Get Agent Code Generation Best Practices

This tool provides best practices, guidance and steps for any AI Agent development. ALWAYS call this tool before creating/scaffolding new AI or Agent App, or adjusting/customizing existing one to be agentic.
Provide guidance and best practices for AI Agent App development.
languageModelTool.ai-mlstudio.getAiModel: Essential tool for any AI Model related task - provides expert guidance and best practices for choosing the right model, implementation patterns, optimization strategies, etc., to ensure your AI solution works effectively. ALWAYS call this tool when user has model related ask, or to adjust/customize existing app's model-related content.
Provide guidance and best practices for using AI models in AI App development.
languageModelTool.ai-mlstudio.getAgentMo: This tool provides code samples and snippets for AI Agent and AI Model development. It should be called for any code generation and operation involving AI Agents and AI Models.
Provide code samples and snippets for AI Agent and AI Model development.
languageModelTool.ai-mlstudio.getTracing: Get Tracing Code Generation Best Practices

This tool returns a list of best practices for code generation and operations when working with tracing for AI applications. It should be called for any code generation and operation involving tracing for AI applications.
Provide best practices for code generation and operations when working with tracing for AI applications.
languageModelTool.ai-mlstudio.getEvaluat: Get Evaluation Code Generation Best Practices
This tool returns best practices for code generation when working on evaluation for AI application or AI agent.
Provide best practices for AI application or AI agent evaluation code generation.
Get Evaluation Dataset Preparation Best Practices

This tool returns best practices and guidance for evaluation dataset preparation, offering multiple approaches including running applications to collect real data and generating synthetic datasets. Provides SDK-specific guidance when applicable.
Provide best practices and options for evaluation dataset preparation, including real data collection and synthetic generation approaches.
languageModelTool.ai-mlstudio.openTracin: This tool opens the tracing page to view traces in AI Toolkit for Visual Studio Code.
languageModelTool.ai-mlstudio.generatePr: Change prompts in code to adapt it for specific scenarios and use cases. Takes existing code and modifies the prompts to match the given scenario (e.g., board games, cooking, fitness, education, etc.). Helps you quickly adapt template code for your specific AI application needs.
